title: Does your w/l ratio reset every season>?
body:
I really wanna know if your w/l reset every season cuz I have this account a long tim eago and i was a real noob but now Im getting better but again my  w/l ratio is terrible :/
Thank you :)

replies.body: It wouldn't make sense to keep your win/loss stats with a new season and all the changes that are made.  Your ranked wins and losses should reset for the next season. :D
What about in normals? Do they also reset?
Nope you will allways have houndreds of loses on normals :DD
